name: The Strongholds of Silberland
description:
Defeat the four evil overlords of Silberland using powerful items you find on your journey. You must achieve your goal before time runs out!

Default Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to confirm and interact with objects in the world
  • Esc to cancel
  • 1-6 to use items
  • L for look mode
  • F4 to double window size
  • Alt+Enter for full screen

This is a puzzly game of resource management disguised as an old-school RPG. It is equally inspired by roguelikes and Euro board games. Mechanics are deterministic and battles against enemies happen in a single turn.

Design, Programming and Music by C.A.S. Art and font credits in Readme

This game is fully playable, but not yet finished. Plans for the final release include completely overhauled art, new mechanics, more content and a progression system linking together individual runs (though not an unlock system).
